rl.photoviewer.fx.view

Class ViewParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • rl.photoviewer.fx.view.ViewParams
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ViewParams
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Provides parameters and simple computations to scale and translate images for viewing.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde
